Description: On I-64 at mile marker 178.6 in the County of Henrico, motorists can expect delays due to a vehicle crash. The east right lane and right shoulder are closed.
Label: Major Incident - Traffic - Vehicle Crash

Description: On I-64 in the City of Norfolk, at Hampton Roads Bridge Tunnel West, motorists can expect delays due to a disabled vehicle. All west lanes are closed. Traffic backups are approximately 2.5 miles.
Label: Major Incident - Traffic - Disabled Vehicle

Description: On US-60 East in the County of New Kent, in the vicinity of Boulevard Rd; Rt. 629E/W (New Kent County), motorists can expect delays due to a vehicle crash. Lane closures exist.
Label: Minor Incident - Traffic - Vehicle Crash

Description: On I-95 at mile marker 136.1 in the County of Stafford, motorists can expect delays due to a disabled tractor trailer. The south right shoulder is closed.
Label: Major Incident - Traffic - Disabled Tractor Trailer

Description: On I-64 East in the City of Hampton, at Hampton Roads Bridge Tunnel East, motorists can expect delays due to congestion. Traffic backups are approximately 2.0 miles.
Label: Major Incident - Traffic - Congestion/Delay
